caption: Called five times, no answer. Trying a different restaurant.

This location doesn't answer their phone. Or they do and put you on silent hold without even saying hello. Or they just answer and hang up. If your that busy take your phone off the hook. No clue how this location is in business with way they run things. They give the other Rosati's locations a bad name.

Horrible customer service. Tisha, the lady, that answers the phone is the most rudest individual treating customers like we're a nuisance. Delivery is over an hour late from scheduled time and they blame it on traffic when i can easily see on google maps that there's no traffic. Will never order here again.

If i could score it lower i would!. Worst customer service ever! even the manager was rude to me!. One hour passed and i never received the order! when i called back they told me that my order was cancelled and they tried to call me back. The manager Oswaldo did not want to offer me service recovery and hanged up when they heard that i was upset. WORST SERVICE EVER.. And they HAVE ROACHES!!!! I also had to repeat my credit card number and telephone number like 5 times and they still didnt get it right!

Oh mama, this pizza is amazing!! The secret is all in their sauce. Rosati's has the best thin crust in Chicago. Definitely always call them directly and never go through a GrubHub if you want your order delivered within an hour.

Ordered on grubhub at 7:01 pm. at 8:43 we called to see what was going on. First time they hung up. second time they said "ah ya our fax machine isn't working" "ah so I think you can get your money back I guess". Obviously not happy. Staff is a joke.
Been there a handful of times, pizza is consistently good.  Better than most places around.
The lady @ the register was nice & helpful, considering I was just getting a slice of pizza. But, thelo pizza is decent, definitely something you can eat after a long night.

I ordered wings and cheese sticks from this location. It was aweful. The wings were hard and nearly burnt and the cheese sticks were the same. I paid $16 for this horrible food plus tipped the delivery guy the change and still ended up going somewhere else to get something to eat the was actually edible. I will never eat here again and encourage all to bi-pass this god forsaken place that doesn't care and will basically send you anything to eat. I know they saw the condition of those wings and cheese sticks and would not eat them themselves. But they had no problem sending them to me. They are a zero on my rate!!!!
Good late night deli and delicious sandwiches....lots of options always takes a while for me to decide between the various good options
Very good deli and very good pizza. It is not the best pizza in the area, but they have a distinct taste with their sauce. I would recommend this if you are excited to try something different/new.

So I ordered Rosati's through GrubHub @ around 5pm. Didn't have my pizza yet at 7pm so I called Grubhub. They told me that there was a problem and my pizza would be leaving in 10 mins. I figured it was an issue where GrubHub and them didn't sync up so I just let it slide.  @ 8pm I called Grubhub again and they told me after calling Rosati's that there was a shift change and that somehow my pizza was lost between the day and night shift. They said it would be another 40 mins or so.  @ around 9:20pm, still no pizza I called Rosati's myself asking if I was ever going to get this pizza. The manager had an attitude, called his driver, said the pizza would be there in 2 mins.  So after almost 5 hours I had a pizza. A pizza that wasn't even hot. Almost as if they purposely left me last on the delivery list. After eating said pizza I was up every hour on the hour running to the bathroom because somehow I ended up with a stomach sickness.  I'm always nice on the phone with customer support because I feel you get better service when you're not yelling at people. I feel that I didn't deserve the service that was given. The GrubHub  people were very nice.  I've lived in this city for 30 years since birth aside from a few years in the military and I have NEVER had such horrible service from ANY pizza place in the city. And I've been to almost all the named pizza places in my city.  Anyway, I felt compelled to share my story. Gratz to Rosati's for getting my first public complaint ever!  Also part of the pizza was missing cheese.........
I ordered a beef and giardinara pizza from this place and there was hardly any beef on it at all.  I showed the pizza to them and they argued with me about it.  Guess you get what you pay for.
Great place for late night pizza and sandwiches in Chicago. Very quick service, great prices, and good food. No complaints here!
